env.parse: Не вдалось розібрати рядок змінної оточення

launch-mods.oculus-description: Якщо ви використовуєте Beat Saber через Steam, це дозволяє використовувати Oculus VR в обхід SteamVR, для потенційного приросту продуктивності. Це не обов'язково для Oculus.
launch-mods.desktop-description: Режим літаючих контроллерів від першого лиця дозволяє використовувати меню за допомогою WASD і мишки. Це облегшує тестування модів, так як гра запускається без використання шолому VR!
launch-mods.debug-description: Включає вікно логів для IPA. В вікні будуть відображатись логи модів.
launch-mods.outdated-tippy: Ця версія застаріла і деякі моди і/або функції можуть працювати некоректно. Рекомендуємо використовувати версію ({recommendedVersion}), щоб скористатись останніми функціями і виправленнями.
launch-mods.skipsteam-description: Запобігає автоматичному відкриттю Steam. Включіть це, якщо ви використовуєте інше серидовище VR (WiVRn/Monado), з яким Steam праює некоректно.
launch-mods.map-editor-description: Запускає офіційний редактор карт Beat Saber замість гри.
launch-mods.proton-logs-description: Увімкнути запис журналів протонів для цієї установки Beat Saber до "{versionPath}".

drop-zone.subtext: Пересуньте свої zip-файли сюди, щоб імпортувати карти
Скиньте свої ".bplist" або ".json" файли сюди, щоб імпортувати їх

mods.mods-not-available: Для цієї версії Beat Saber поки що немає модів

outdated-mods.title: Застарілий мод
outdated-mods.description-plural: Ця версія має {nb} застаріл(-ий/-і/-их) мод(-и/-ів). Ви хочете оновити їх?

drop-zone.subtext: Завантажте свої ".zip" або ".dll" файли сюди, щоб імпортувати їх

steam-and-oculus.title: Steam & Oculus
steam-and-oculus.description: Вийшовши з системи, ви зможете змінити обліковий запис під час наступного завантаження Beat Saber.

download-platform.title: Платформа за замовчуванням
download-platform.desc: Виберіть платформу за замовчуванням, яку ви хочете використовувати для завантаження версій Beat Saber.

installation-folder.title: Тека встановлення
installation-folder.description: Змініть теку, яка міститиме весь контент, завантажений BSManager.

proton-folder.title: Тека Proton
proton-folder.description: Змініть теку на шлях до Proton. (напр. Proton - Experimental)

additional-content.title: Додатковий контент
additional-content.description: Додатковий контент, що дозволяє налаштувати Beat Saber!

patreon.title: Підтримайте BSManager 💖
patreon.description: Підтримайте проєкт і допоможіть нам продовжувати вдосконалювати BSManager.

discord.description: Приєднуйтесь до спільноти BSManager, підписавшись на наші соціальні мережі!

contribution.description: Запропонуйте нові функції або повідомте про помилку, щоб допомогти покращити BSManager!

hardware-acceleration.title: Апаратне прискорення
hardware-acceleration.description: Увімкніть апаратне прискорення, щоб використовувати ваш GPU та покращити продуктивність BSManager. Вимкніть цю опцію, якщо у вас спостерігаються просідання кадрів.

modal.title: Потрібен перезапуск
modal.body: Зміна налаштувань апаратного прискорення призведе до виходу та повторного запуску BSManager. Ви впевнені, що хочете це зробити?

error-notification.message: Сталася помилка, неможливо вимкнути апаратне прискорення.

use-symlinks.title: Використовувати символьні посилання
use-symlinks.description: Використовувати символьні посилання замість з'єднань для прив’язки папок. Увімкніть цю опцію лише за необхідності.

modal.title: Дозволи для символьних посилань
modal.body: Для створення символьних посилань BSManager потребуватиме прав адміністратора або увімкненого режиму розробника у вашій системі. Ви впевнені, що хочете продовжити?

error-notification.message: Сталася помилка, неможливо змінити налаштування символьних посилань.

use-system-proxy.title: Використовувати системний проксі
use-system-proxy.description: BSManager виконуватиме мережеві запити через ваш системний проксі.

error-notification.message: Сталася помилка, неможливо змінити налаштування системного проксі.

msg.operation-running: Wait for the current operation to finish, then try again.
msg.no-internet: Check your connection and try again.

msg.ManifestChecksum: The previously downloaded manifest does not match the new 🤔
msg.ConnectionLost: The connection has been lost, try again...
msg.ConnectionError: Unable to connect to Steam, try again...
msg.Unknown: Something strange has happened 🤔 Your connection is probably unstable.

msg.401: Steam doesn't seem to want to let us download Beat Saber 😢
msg.ExeNotFoundWindows: "DepotDownloader.exe" is missing. Please check if the executable is quarantined by your anti-virus.
msg.InvalidCredentials: Invalid login credentials, unapproved connection, or too many login attempts.
msg.DirectoryCreate: Unable to install the necessary folders.
msg.NotAvailableApp: Are you trying to download Beat Saber when you don't have it? 🤣
msg.DepotNotFound: Unable to download Beat Saber 😥 try again later 😕
msg.InvalidManifest: Unable to download Beat Saber 😥 try again later 😕
msg.NoValidKey: Unable to download Beat Saber 😥 try again later 😕
msg.NoManifestCode: Unable to download Beat Saber 😥 try again later 😕
msg.NotAllowed: Apparently you are not allowed to download Beat Saber 🥱
msg.SteamLib: If you have this error, report the bug on GitHub with the logs pls.
msg.ConnectionError: Unable to connect to Steam after 10 tries 🤯
msg.LicenceError: Unable to get the list of licenses.
msg.RateLimitExceeded: You've tried too many times, wait a while and try again later.
msg.TokenRejected: Your login token has been rejected 😕 Please try again.
msg.AccessDenied: Access to Steam has been denied.

msg.DOWNLOAD_MANIFEST_FAILED: Unable to download the manifest for this version; your login token may be invalid.
msg.MANIFEST_FILE_NOT_FOUND: Unable to find the manifest for this version.
msg.PARSE_MANIFEST_FILE_FAILED: An error occurred while reading the manifest.
msg.ALREADY_DOWNLOADING: A version is already being downloaded.
msg.UNABLE_TO_GET_MANIFEST: Unable to obtain the manifest required for download.
msg.VERIFY_INTEGRITY_FAILED: An error occurred during file verification.
msg.META_LOGIN_TIMED_OUT: The login token took too long to retrieve.
msg.META_LOGIN_WINDOW_CLOSED_BY_USER: The Meta login window was closed.
msg.NO_META_AUTH_TOKEN: Unable to retrieve the Meta login token required for download.

start-import.title: Import in progress 👌
start-import.desc: The import may take several minutes depending on your configuration.

import-error.desc: Check that the selected folder is a Beat Saber installation.

descs.transfer-started: The transfer has started and may take several minutes depending on your configuration.

descs.COPY_TO_SUBPATH: The destination folder cannot be a subfolder of the source folder.
descs.restore-linked-folders: An error occurred while restoring shared folders. You can still manually restore them via the 'Shared Folders' menu on the versions page.

check-all-enabled.title: OneClick Disabled
check-all-enabled.description: One or more OneClick installations are disabled. Go to settings to enable them.

msg.STEAM_LAUNCHING: Beat Saber will automatically launch after Steam.
msg.SKIPPING_STEAM_LAUNCH: I hope you know what you're doing :)

msg.STEAM_NOT_RUNNING: Steam must be running to launch BeatSaber.
msg.OCULUS_NOT_RUNNING: Oculus must be running to launch BeatSaber.
msg.BS_ALREADY_RUNNING: Close BeatSaber before launching it again.
msg.EXE_NOT_FINDED: Some files seem to be missing, try to verify the files.
msg.EXIT: BeatSaber stopped abruptly, tries to check the files.
msg.OCULUS_LIB_NOT_FOUND: Check that the Oculus application is properly installed, and that the libraries are correctly defined in Oculus.
msg.PROTON_NOT_SET: Set the Proton path in settings.
msg.PROTON_NOT_FOUND: Set the Proton path in settings.
msg.ORIGINAL_OCULUS_NOT_INSTALLED: Beat Saber must be installed from the Oculus app before opening.

steam-launching.title: Steam is launching!
steam-launching.description: Beat Saber will automatically launch after Steam.

msg.CantEditSteam: You can't edit the Steam version. You can clone it though.

msg.warning: One or more mods could not be installed.

errors.no-mods: No mods are installed in this version 😑

titles.error: An error occurred during the mods import

msgs.no-dlls: The file(s) do not contain any "dll" files.

one-click-install.error: An error occurred while installing the map

titles.error: An error occurred during the maps import

msgs.invalid-zip: The zip file(s) do not contain any maps.

one-click-install.error: An error occurred while installing the playlist
An error occurred while installing the model

userdata-backup-created.title: Backup created
userdata-backup-created.msg: Sharing the 'UserData' folder can generate errors, in case of problems unlink the folder to restore the backup

msg.EPERM: BSManager does not have the necessary permissions to link the folder.
msg.EACCES: BSManager does not have the necessary permissions to link the folder.
msg.ENOSPC: The disk is full, make some space and try again.
msg.LinkingNotSupported: Folder linking is not supported on this file system.
msg.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error has occurred while linking the folder.

adding-error.title: Adding shared folder failed
adding-error.msg: You can't add "{folder}" to shared folders.

success.title: Shortcut created
success.msg: The shortcut has been created on the desktop.
success.msg-steam: The shortcut has been created in the Steam library.

error.msg: An error occurred while creating the shortcut.

bs-version-oudated.title: Version Outdated
bs-version-oudated.msg: This Beat Saber version is outdated, use the recommended version to enjoy the latest features and bugfixes

choose-store.title: Which platform?
choose-store.body: Select the platform from which you wish to download Beat Saber.
choose-store.set-in-settings: Set the default platform in settings

steam-login.title: Steam Login

password.label: Password
password.max-length-warning: The password exceeds 64 characters! If the password is invalid, try to enter only its first 64 characters.

note.to-connect-with-qr: to sign in via QR code.

steam-login.need-help-to-connect: I need help to access my account!

steam-auth-approve.title: Waiting for confirmation
steam-auth-approve.use-steam-app-to-approve: Use the Steam mobile app to confirm the connection...
steam-auth-approve.not-access-to-steam-app: I don't have access to the Steam mobile app

steam-credentials.title: Steam Credentials
steam-credentials.p-1: Your Steam credentials are only required to download versions of Beat Saber, we use DepotDownloader to achieve this which requires your Steam credentials to verify that you own the game within your library before allowing you to retrieve the game files, your credentials are not stored or saved and are passed directly to DepotDownloader. However, if you don't want to do that, you can follow this tutorial instead:
steam-credentials.p-2: Afterwards you can click on the gear icon in the top right corner and select "Import a version", then you can select the folder where Beat Saber was downloaded to. (If you followed the tutorial, you will have the right location)

bs-import-version.title: Import a version
bs-import-version.description: Imports a version of Beat Saber to use with BSManager. This will copy the selected Beat Saber installation folder to the BSManager versions folder.
bs-import-version.oculus-version-tooltip: Check if it's an Oculus version

bs-uninstall.title: Uninstall
bs-uninstall.description: Are you sure you want to uninstall Beat Saber {version}? You will have to download it again to play it.

install-folder.title: Installation folder
install-folder.description: Changing the default installation folder will result in moving all installed data to the new folder.

clone-version.title: Clone version
clone-version.description: Cloning the version allows you to separate additional Beat Saber content between two versions.

uninstall-mod.title: Uninstall
uninstall-mod.description: Are you sure you want to uninstall {mod}? It could cause other installed mods to malfunction.
uninstall-mod.description-bsipa: Are you sure you want to uninstall BSIPA? After that all installed mods will not work anymore.

uninstall-all-mods.title: Uninstalling mods
uninstall-all-mods.description: Are you sure you want to uninstall all the mods from version {version}? This operation cannot be undone.

desc.single: Are you sure you want to delete the map {name}?
desc.multiple: Are you sure you want to delete all {nb} maps?

desc.single: This map is part of the shared maps
desc.multiple: These maps are part of the shared maps

title.single: This map will also be removed from versions using shared maps
title.multiple: These maps will also be removed from versions using shared maps

link-contents.title: Link {contentType}
link-contents.p-1: Linking {contentType} allows sharing {contentType} between all versions with this feature enabled. Once linked, this version will benefit from shared {contentType}.
link-contents.p-2: In order to enjoy the linking feature, all your {itemsHtml} will be moved to the {sharedHtml} folder. After that, a symbolic link pointing to the shared {contentType} folder will replace your original {contentType} folder.
link-contents.warning: Please note that any changes affecting {contentType} will also affect all versions with this feature enabled.

unlink-contents.title: Unlink {contentType}
unlink-contents.p-1: Be careful, unlinking {contentType} will disable the use of shared {contentType} for this version, until it is reenabled.
unlink-contents.p-2: In order to unlink your maps, the symbolic link pointing to the {sharedHtml} will be removed. After that, all maps in the shared folder will be copied to the {itemsHtml} folder of your Beat Saber version.
unlink-contents.do-not-copy-contents-tip: If enabled, {contentType} in the shared folder will not be copied to your Beat Saber version. As a result, no {contentType} will remain in your Beat Saber version after unlinking.

mods-disclaimer.title: disclaimer
mods-disclaimer.p-1: By choosing to use mods, you understand that:
mods-disclaimer.li-1: You may experience problems that don't exist in the vanilla game. 99.9% of bugs, crashes, and lag are due to mods.
mods-disclaimer.li-2: Mods are subject to being broken by updates and that's normal - be patient and respectful when this happens, as modders are volunteers with real lives.
mods-disclaimer.li-3: Beat Games aren't purposefully trying to break mods. They wish to work on the codebase and sometimes this breaks mods, but they are not out to kill mods.
mods-disclaimer.p-2: Do not attack the game developers for issues related to mods, and vice versa - modders and game developers are two separate groups. Just don't be a jerk ok.

shared-folders.title: Shared Folders
shared-folders.description: Link Beat Saber folders to synchronize their contents with shared folders in other versions. Note that deleting content will also be shared.

adding-shared-folder.title: Adding Shared Folder
adding-shared-folder.description: You might experience issues when linking the "{folder}" folder. Are you sure you want to add it?

create-launch-shortcut.title: Create a shortcut
create-launch-shortcut.desc: Creating a shortcut will allow you to start Beat Saber with the chosen options without going through BSManager.
create-launch-shortcut.steam-shortcut-tippy: If enabled, instead of creating a shortcut on the desktop, it will be created in Steam.

body.token-needed: Your Meta connection token is required to download Beat Saber.
body.need-cookie-enabled: By logging into Meta, a login window will open and you can then start the login process. Please ensure to accept cookies, otherwise, we might not be able to retrieve your token to start the download.
body.enter-token-manually-tooltip: This will allow you to enter your login token without going through Meta login.

enable-oculus-sideloaded-apps.title: Enable Sideloading
enable-oculus-sideloaded-apps.info-1: In order to launch Beat Saber, the ability to run sideloaded apps must be enabled. BSManager will request administrator rights to enable this feature automatically.
enable-oculus-sideloaded-apps.info-2: The sideloaded apps feature allows launching games located outside your Oculus library folder.
enable-oculus-sideloaded-apps.info-3: After sideloading is activated, the feature will remain active, and you will no longer be prompted to enable it.
enable-oculus-sideloaded-apps.i-want-to-do-it-myself: I want to do it myself

body.info-enter-token: To download Beat Saber, your Oculus login token is required.
body.how-obtain-token: How do I obtain my Oculus Token?
body.have-token-saved: I already have a token saved
body.save-token-info: This will save your token for easier reuse. You will need to create a password to encrypt your token for storage purposes. If you ever forget your password, you just need to provide your token again.
body.info-enter-password: To download Beat Saber, your Oculus login token is required. Enter the password used to save your Oculus token.
body.info-disabled-btn-password: The token decrypted with the provided password is invalid. Make sure the password is the same as the one used to save the token.

body.info: Steam has been detected as running with administrator permissions. To communicate with Steam, Beat Saber must also be launched as an administrator. Otherwise, Beat Saber might experience problems and close after launching.
body.info-2: Launching Beat Saber in administrator mode will also give administrator rights to the installed mods. Therefore, it is recommended to restart Steam without administrator permissions.
body.info-3: Note that it is advised against giving administrator rights to Steam, as this affects the installed games and mods, presenting a security risk.

ask-install-path.title: Installation folder
ask-install-path.choose-folder-description: Choose the folder that will contain all the content downloaded by BSManager. (versions, mods, maps, playlists, etc.)

choose-proton-folder.title: Proton Folder
choose-proton-folder.proton-folder-description: On Linux, BSManager requires Proton to work. Choose the Proton installation folder to continue.

bs-version-outdated.body: The version {outdatedVersion} is outdated, and some mods or features may no longer work as expected. Please download the latest recommended version ({recommendedVersion}) of Beat Saber to enjoy the latest features and bugfixes.

delete-model.title: Delete the model
delete-model.desc: Are you sure you want to delete the model {modelName}?
delete-model.linked-annotation: This model will be removed from all linked versions.

delete-models.title: Delete models
delete-models.desc: Are you sure you want to delete the {nb} models?
delete-models.linked-annotation: These models will be removed from all linked versions.

search-tips.author-desc: Show only models from the specified author.
search-tips.hash-desc: Show only models with the specified hash.
search-tips.tag-desc: Show only models with the specified tag.
search-tips.name-desc: Show only models with the specified name.
search-tips.discordid-desc: Show only models from the specified discord user.
search-tips.status-desc: Show only models with the specified status. (profile only, and only for the author)

download-models.error-occurred: An error occurred, try again later.

prevent-for-mods.title: Required mods
prevent-for-mods.desc: Make sure you've installed the necessary mods to use models in Beat Saber

success.UNABLE_TO_LAUNCH_STEAM: Unable to launch Steam, forcing Beat Saber launch...

playlist.error-playlist-creation-desc: An error occurred while creating the playlist.
playlist.playlist-created-desc: The playlist has been successfully created. You can now sync its maps!
playlist.error-playlists-synchronization-desc: An error occurred while synchronizing playlists.
playlist.playlists-synchronized-desc: Playlists and their maps have been downloaded.
playlist.playlists-export-error-desc: An error occurred while exporting playlists.
playlist.playlists-with-maps-exported-desc: Playlists and their maps have been successfully exported.
playlist.playlist-delete-error-desc: An error occurred while deleting the playlist.
playlist.playlist-edit-error-desc: An error occurred while editing the playlist.
playlist.playlist-edited-desc: The playlist has been successfully modified. You can now sync its maps!
playlist.delete-playlist-desc: Are you sure you want to delete the playlist "{playlistTitle}"?
playlist.delete-playlists-desc: Are you sure you want to delete {nb} playlists?
playlist.delete-playlist-maps-tip: If enabled, all maps in the playlist will be deleted
playlist.delete-playlists-maps-tip: If enabled, all maps in the playlists will be deleted
playlist.export-playlist-desc: Are you sure you want to export the playlist "{playlistTitle}"?
playlist.export-playlists-desc: Are you sure you want to export {nb} playlists?
playlist.export-playlist-maps-tip: If enabled, all maps in the playlist will also be exported
playlist.export-playlists-maps-tip: If enabled, all maps in the playlists will also be exported
playlist.need-clone-desc-1: This playlist has been downloaded from an external site and contains a synchronization link.
playlist.need-clone-desc-2: To avoid losing your changes during synchronization, the playlist will be duplicated and its synchronization link removed.
playlist.need-clone-desc-3: You can then, if you wish, delete the original playlist.
playlist.synchronize-playlist-desc: Are you sure you want to synchronize the playlist "{playlistTitle}"?
playlist.synchronize-playlists-desc: Are you sure you want to synchronize {nb} playlists?
playlist.synchronize-playlist-tip: This action updates playlists and downloads missing maps; it may take several minutes.
playlist.error-occur-while-loading-playlists: An error occurred while loading playlists
playlist.error-occur-while-loading-playlist: An error occurred while loading the playlist
playlist.no-maps-found-for-playlist: No maps found for this playlist
playlist.no-map-installed-for-playlist: No maps installed for this playlist
playlist.playlist-is-waiting-to-download: The playlist is waiting to download
playlist.some-playlist-maps-are-missing: Some maps in this playlist are missing
playlist.title: Title
playlist.author: Author
playlist.edit-playlist-shortcuts: Hold Shift or Ctrl to select multiple maps
playlist.all-playlists-have-been-successfully-imp: All playlists have been successfully imported
playlist.no-playlist-found-in-selected-files: No playlist found in the selected files

some-playlists-have-been-imported.INVALID_SOURCE: Some playlists could not be found
some-playlists-have-been-imported.unknown: Some playlists could not be imported
